name: World War II: TCG
description: World War II: TCG is a free-to-play collectible card game. Create your own Army Deck with Tanks, Infantry, Aircrafts, Ships, Submarines and Structures!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.0GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Any Hardware 3D Accelerated graphics card Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 2.4GHz Graphics: Any Hardware 3D Accelerated graphics card Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 300 MB available space
